Generative AI chatbot for Q&A and 
document summarization
1
Developed a chatbot leveraging OpenAI GPT models to enhance operational 
efficiency and accelerate response times by reducing the time spent on manual 
data interpretation, optimizing report preparation, and improving data 
organization
Private equity firm

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking for preparing draft summaries based on diverse documents that are vital for daily operations and decision-
making processes, but the datasets include non-proprietary data such as public filings, earnings transcripts, investor 
presentations, etc., along with proprietary documents often in an unstructured format.
Private equity firm needs to address Q&A and summarize 
documents using Gen-AI chatbot
2
Your value is enhanced. 
You have reduced the turnaround time in preparing summaries and reports by ~5x, minimizing manual data interpretation 
and enhancing the efficiency of report preparation processes. You have improved data security through the implementation 
of ring-fencing measures, which restricts the transfer of data outside the client environment.
GENERATIVE AI CHATBOT FOR Q&A 
AND DOCUMENT SUMMARIZATION
KEY RESULT   
•
Reduced turnaround 
time by ~5x times
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
Sales and customer 
analytics
•
Cash reconciliation
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to enhance operational efficiency and accelerate response times by reducing the time spent on 
manual data interpretation, optimizing report preparation, and improving data organization, including:
1) Developing a Conversational AI Platform leveraging OpenAI GPT and Anthropic Claude models capable of processing 
and summarizing diverse document types, both proprietary and non-proprietary.
2) Enabling private Chat GPT for firm-wide use to provide users with private and secure access to OpenAI API
3) Building an organizational wide knowledge base with Retrieval-Augmented Generation, enabling information extraction 
and content summarization.
4) Developing analytical dashboards to assess user engagement and track the cost overheads associated with the 
system's operations.
5) Building a custom MS word add-in to perform actions such as generate draft content, Q&A session, sourcing 
information from user uploaded documents etc.
6) Developing a user-friendly interface to facilitate seamless interactive conversations.

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Developed a Conversational AI Platform leveraging OpenAI GPT and Anthropic Claude models capable of processing and summarizing diverse document types, 
both proprietary and non-proprietary
•
Enabled private Chat GPT for firm-wide use to provide users with private and secure access to OpenAI API
•
Built an organizational wide knowledge base with Retrieval-Augmented Generation, enabling information extraction and content summarization
•
Developed analytical dashboards to assess user engagement and track the cost overheads associated with the system's operations
•
Built a custom MS word add-in to perform actions such as generate draft content, Q&A session, sourcing information from user uploaded documents etc.
•
Developed a user-friendly interface to facilitate seamless interactive conversations
Situation
•
Client leveraged a wide range of diverse documents that are vital for its daily operations and decision-making processes
•
Datasets included non-proprietary data such as public filings, earnings transcripts, investor presentations, etc., along with proprietary documents often in an 
unstructured format
•
Client spent a significant amount of time reviewing and preparing draft summaries based on the documents
•
Partnered with the client to enhance operational efficiency and accelerate response times by reducing the time spent on manual data interpretation, optimizing 
report preparation, and improving data organization
Generative AI chatbot for Q&A and document summarization
3
Impact
•
Reduced the turnaround time in preparing summaries and reports by ~5x, minimizing manual data interpretation and enhancing the efficiency of report 
preparation processes
•
Improved data security through the implementation of ring-fencing measures, which restricts the transfer of data outside the client environment
Generative AI chatbot

Chatbot solution design – Azure platform
4
Organization
Azure Ecosystem (Azure Private Tenant)
Load 
Balancer

Service

PDFs, Websites, 
Excels, Memos, 
etc.

Deal Team
1
9
4
5
3
Browser
6
Azure Open AI
Azure 
Private Link
2
Azure Cosmos 
DB
7
8
1
Load balancer will efficiently handle user 
traffic and ensure high  throughput for the 
application services
2
Azure Private Link is a virtual network 
service and will provide an isolated private 
network for components to communicate
3
App service provides vertical and 
horizontal scalability for the application to 
meet dynamic user demand
Data is securely transferred between chat bot and app service by SSL/HTTPS secure connections
4
Azure Key Vault is a key management 
service and will be used to generate and 
store keys used for data encryption
5
Redis is a high throughput datastore and 
will be useful for caching, session storage 
and application throttling
6
Cosmos DB is a fast, distributed and 
scalable NoSQL database and will be used 
to store chat history
7
Azure OpenAI provides GPT3.5 turbo 
which is one of the most advanced LLM 
but can be swapped with similar LLMs
8
Milvus is an open-source vector database 
and will be used to store the vectorized 
documents and perform similarity search
9
Lang chain is a software development 
framework designed to simplify the 
creation of applications using LLMs

Quarterly Financial Data from Valuation Model
Creativity 
level
Financial Highlights
Comments
Low
•
Company's LTM 1/31/23 revenue was $85.2 million, up 16.4% from a year 
prior. LTM 1/31/23 recurring revenue was $77.1 million, comprising 90.5% 
of total revenue.
•
The Company's EBITDA for the LTM 1/31/23 was $52.2 million, 
representing a margin of 61.3%.
•
The Company's net debt as of 1/31/23 was $56.3 million. This is calculated 
as the difference between the term loan and convertible note of $250.2 
million and cash and cash equivalents of $84.1 million, adjusted for 
converted cash awards of $29.1 million and net cash of $12.0 million.
•
The total enterprise value as of 1/31/23 was $716.7 million.
Strictly 
adhering to 
provided 
examples
High
•
Company’s LTM 1/31/23 revenue was $85.2 million, a 16.4% increment from 
the previous year.
•
The Company's recurring revenue was $77.1 million, which made up 90.5% 
of the total revenue and showed an 8.4% YoY growth.
•
EBITDA for the same period was $52.2 million, showing a 61.3% margin. 
The Company's Free Cash Flow was calculated to be $52.4 million after a 
Capex of $0.2 million.
•
As of January 31, 2023, Company had a Net Debt of $56.3 million. The Net 
Debt was calculated taking a Term Loan and Convertible Note of $250.2 
million and Cash and Cash equivalents of $84.1 million into account. The 
Company also had $29.1 million in Converted Cash Awards.
•
The total enterprise value as of LTM 1/31/23 was $716.7 million. The ratio of 
total enterprise value to recurring revenue was 8.4x, while the ratio of net 
debt to recurring revenue was N/A.
Exploratory 
and creative 
generation to 
go beyond 
provided 
examples 
The financial highlights above are generated using OpenAI LLM, leveraging financial 
data from the valuation model. Utilizing fundamental prompting techniques and 
adjusting creativity parameters, sample summaries were generated. 
AI Generated Financial Summary
